{"id":743456798,"lang":"cpp","time":"2 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1657462959,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"54 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/743456798/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"31.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int pivotIndex(vector<int>& nums) {\n        if(!nums.size()) return -1;\n        if(nums.size()==1) return 0;\n        int sum = 0, leftSum = 0;\n        for(auto i : nums)\n            sum += i;\n        for (int i = 0; i < nums.size(); i++){\n            if (leftSum*2 == sum - nums[i])\n                return i;\n            leftSum += nums[i];\n        }\n        return -1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index"}
